original_text: Dead flies cause the ointment of the apothecary to send forth a stinking savour: so doth a little folly him that is in reputation for wisdom and honour.
korean_text: 죽은 파리들이 향기름을 악취가 나게 만드는 것 같이 적은 우매가 지혜와 존귀를 난처하게 만드느니라

sentences.original_text: Dead flies cause the ointment of the apothecary
to send forth a stinking savour:
him that is in reputation for wisdom and honour.
